tool_description: Analyzes supplier performance metrics including delivery reliability, quality scores, and lead time consistency to support procurement decisions.

supplier_ids.description: List of supplier IDs to analyze

analysis_start_date.description: Start date for performance analysis period

analysis_end_date.description: End date for performance analysis period

product_categories.description: Filter analysis by specific product categories

minimum_orders.description: Minimum number of orders required for inclusion in analysis

weight_delivery.description: Weight for delivery performance in overall score (0-1)

weight_quality.description: Weight for quality performance in overall score (0-1)

weight_cost.description: Weight for cost competitiveness in overall score (0-1)

error_messages: Invalid supplier ID: One or more supplier IDs are not recognized in the system.
Invalid date range: analysis_start_date must be before analysis_end_date.
Invalid weights: The sum of weight_delivery, weight_quality, and weight_cost must equal 1.0.
Insufficient data: One or more suppliers have fewer orders than minimum_orders threshold.
Invalid minimum orders: minimum_orders must be between 1 and 100.
usage: Provide supplier_ids and analysis date range. Optionally filter by product_categories and adjust performance weights. Set minimum_orders to ensure statistical significance.

supplier_scores.description: Array of supplier performance records in format 'SupplierID|OverallScore|DeliveryScore|QualityScore|CostScore'

rankings.description: Suppliers ranked by overall performance score

analysis_summary.description: Summary of key findings and recommendations

total_suppliers_analyzed.description: Number of suppliers included in the analysis
